name: @ng-devtools/plugin
description: A simple Webpack 2 starter with TypeScript transpilation

scripts.prebuild: yarn build:lib && shx rm -rf ./dist/ && cd ../devtools-page && yarn build
scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.config.js && shx cp -r ../devtools-page/build/* ./dist/ && shx cp -r ./popup.html ./dist/ && cp manifest.json ./dist/ && cp ./src/devtools.html ./dist/
